thread.title: Dollar Rises Against Latin American Currencies

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Rises Against Latin American Currencies
text:
The Argentine peso hit fresh lows against the dollar Monday, as concerns grew over $30 billion in local debt set to mature this week.
The dollar was recently up around 8.7% against the peso at 25.07. The U.S. currency has risen around 33% against the peso this year.
Investors will be closely watching Argentina on Tuesday, when the central...
